languages.text: "Бессердечный" остался без {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}поля Геллера{/g}, Саргона — прыжок в варп без него будет хуже смерти. Ты не настолько безумен, чтобы..."
"The Heartless has lost its {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g}, Sargona. A warp jump without it would be worse than death. Even you are not crazy enough to—"
languages.original_text: "Бессердечный" остался без {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}поля Геллера{/g}, Саргона — прыжок в варп без него будет хуже смерти. Ты не настолько безумен, чтобы..."

traits.locale_text: "The Heartless has lost its Geller field, Sargona. A warp jump without it would be worse than death. Even you are not crazy enough to—"
"The Heartless has lost its Geller field, Sargona. A warp jump without it would be worse than death. Even you are not crazy enough to—"

languages.text: "Die Heartless hat ihr {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Gellerfeld{/g} verloren, Sargona. Ein Warpsprung wäre schlimmer als der Tod. Selbst Ihr seid nicht verrückt genug, um ..."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless has lost its {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g}, Sargona. A warp jump without it would be worse than death. Even you are not crazy enough to—"

traits.locale_text: "Die Heartless hat ihr Gellerfeld verloren, Sargona. Ein Warpsprung wäre schlimmer als der Tod. Selbst Ihr seid nicht verrückt genug, um ..."

languages.text: « Le Sans-Cœur a perdu son champ de {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller{/g}, Sargona. Sans lui, tout saut dans le Warp sera pire que la mort. Même vous n'êtes pas assez fou pour... »
languages.original_text: "The Heartless has lost its {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g}, Sargona. A warp jump without it would be worse than death. Even you are not crazy enough to—"

traits.locale_text: « Le Sans-Cœur a perdu son champ de Geller, Sargona. Sans lui, tout saut dans le Warp sera pire que la mort. Même vous n'êtes pas assez fou pour... »

languages.text: «La Desalmada ha perdido su campo de {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller{/g}, Sargona. Efectuar un salto a la disformidad sin él entraña un destino peor que la muerte. Ni siquiera usted está tan loco como para...».
languages.original_text: "The Heartless has lost its {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g}, Sargona. A warp jump without it would be worse than death. Even you are not crazy enough to—"

traits.locale_text: «La Desalmada ha perdido su campo de Geller, Sargona. Efectuar un salto a la disformidad sin él entraña un destino peor que la muerte. Ni siquiera usted está tan loco como para...».

languages.text: “无心号的{g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}盖勒力场{/g}已经失效了，萨戈纳。若是强行进入亚空间，只会落得比死亡更可怕的下场。就算是你，也不会这么疯——”
languages.original_text: "The Heartless has lost its {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g}, Sargona. A warp jump without it would be worse than death. Even you are not crazy enough to—"

traits.locale_text: “无心号的盖勒力场已经失效了，萨戈纳。若是强行进入亚空间，只会落得比死亡更可怕的下场。就算是你，也不会这么疯——”

languages.text: 「サルゴナ、ハートレスの{g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}ゲラーフィールド{/g}が消失した。あれなしでワープジャンプすれば、死ぬより酷い目に遭うぞ。いくらお前でも、そこまで狂ってはないはず—」
languages.original_text: "The Heartless has lost its {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g}, Sargona. A warp jump without it would be worse than death. Even you are not crazy enough to—"

traits.locale_text: 「サルゴナ、ハートレスのゲラーフィールドが消失した。あれなしでワープジャンプすれば、死ぬより酷い目に遭うぞ。いくらお前でも、そこまで狂ってはないはず—」

languages.text: "Taşkalp, {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller alanını{/g} kaybetti Sargona. Bu alan olmadan öte sıçrama yapmak ölmekten bile beterdir. Tabii şey yapacak kadar deli değilsen..."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless has lost its {g|Encyclopedia:GellerField}Geller field{/g}, Sargona. A warp jump without it would be worse than death. Even you are not crazy enough to—"
